judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed as to corporate appellant Lincoln Speedway, Inc.
In accordance with the stipulation entered into by counsel on behalf of their respective clients the decree entered against Hillen Y. Rife and Elizabeth R. Rife individually is hereby vacated.
Each party to pay own costs.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Peter J. Mangan, with him Griest & Mangan, for appellants.
casebody.head_matter:
Rife Appeal.
Argued April 27, 1973.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
Peter J. Mangan, with him Griest & Mangan, for appellants.
E. Nelson Read, for appellees.
May 22, 1974:
